title: Amazon MQ for ActiveMQ Integration with Amazon Redshift using Amazon EventBridge Pipes
description: How to send messages from mazon MQ for ActiveMQ  queue to Amazon Redshift Cluster using Amazon EventBridge Pipes

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The solution will create an Amazon MQ for ActiveMQ message broker, SQS queue, Redshift Cluster, and an EventBridge Pipes to connect it all.
EventBridge pipes consume messages from source ActiveMQ.DLQ queue then transform the message to create an insert queries and insert data to Amazon Redshift cluster.

bullets.text: Amazon EventBridge Pipes with Amazon MQ for ActiveMQ

text: See the README in the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
